channel.title: Posts on Patterns in Parens
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Patterns in Parens

item.title: Chapter 1
item.description: This is an attempt to learn more about how people structure Clojure projects and which patterns they commonly use. I started this with only basic knowledge about Clojure and ClojureScript, but not without knowledge about the Lisp-family of languages or functional programming in general. My goal here is to “mine” different projects for things to learn about Clojure. As such I may be a little all over the place, searching for things to learn.
